climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: LAUNDRY DETERGENT - Laundry detergent in a convenient strip format. Dissolves completely in hot or cold water and can be used in standard or HE machines. Place strip(s) into washer drum before adding clothes (1 strip for small-medium loads, 2 strips for medium-large loads). Place clothes in washer. Begin wash cycle
SO EASY - No mess, no measuring! Easier than liquid, powder, pods, packs or pacs!
HOW TO - Tear off 1 strip (or 2 for large loads), place strip(s) in washer drum before adding clothes, place clothes in washer, and begin desired wash cycle
SPACE SAVING - Great for small spaces such as apartments, dorms, senior living
Breezeo Laundry Detergent Strips are a USDA Certified Biobased Product
We occasionally update our package, so there may be a difference from what you receive and the images you see here. Don't worry, it's the same great product inside
body.description: Breezeo Laundry Detergent Strips: Laundry detergent in a convenient strip format with a Fresh Linen scent.Easy to use! 1 strip = 1 load or 2 strips for a larger or heavily soiled load. Place strip(s) into washer drum before adding clothes. Place clothes in washer. Begin wash cycle. A convenient laundry solution for people who have limited storage space for their laundry products or have to carry laundry products to shared facilities in apartments and dorms. A great solution for hand-washing your favorite garments!Ideal to take along for travel and camping.Pods, pacs and packs can leak or burst and are only a single serve size. Breezeo Strips are the mess-free solution that can be adjusted to perfectly dose any load size! Place sheets in washer first, then add clothes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lighter than Liquid Lighter than liquid with less packaging, our detergent is a great replacement for heavy jugs of liquid. No more lugging large containers! USDA BioPreferred Approved Breezeo Laundry Detergent Strips contain 55% biobased content, certified by the USDA BioPreferred Program. Perfect for Trips These lightweight laundry strips are perfect for travel with no risk of a pod puncturing in your suitcase. Pack less and save money in hotel laundry facilities. You can even use them for handwashing garments in the sink if a sudden spill occurs! Not Tested on Animals We love our furry friends - Breezeo Strips aren't tested on animals and contain no animal-derived ingredients! Lightweight Plant Based Travel Essentials Cruelty Free

Breezeo Product Family Fresh Linen Laundry Detergent Strips Laundry detergent in a convenient strip format.Easier than liquid, powder, pods, packs or pacs!Dissolves completely in hot or cold water and can be used in either standard or HE machines.Great to take along when you travel - whether you're camping, backpacking or going via plane!Space saving product for smaller dwellings such as apartments, dorms, senior living and urban areas! Mountain Fresh Dryer Sheets Breezeo dryer sheets are uniquely formulated with a powerful fragrance that will keep your home and laundry smelling fresh.Once you toss a sheet in the dryer, the fragrance disperses, leaving your clothes with a fresh, 'just cleaned' scentBreezeo dryer sheets can also be used in a variety of places like closets, drawers, gym bags, lockers, and cars to keep them smelling fresh!

Free From Breezeo Laundry Detergent Sheets are free from Optical Brighteners Added Dyes Chlorine Bleach Parabens Premeasured Strips of Laundry Detergent Tear off one strip (or two for large loads), add it to the washing machine drum, add clothes, select the desired cycle, hit start, and you're done! These waterless detergent strips are convenient to store, lightweight, and so easy to use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans well, no bulky bottle. Cost effective. Will continue to buy and use product
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, smells good and it is helping the environment. Love it. I keep it in a zip lock bag so it doesn't get wet. Will buy again.Bought 2 this time. 46 strips, one per load. Sometimes I use 2 strips at a time for heavy duty washing. Like the Fresh Linen scent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fall in Love with Doing Laundry!
reviews.reviewText: I used to be a die-hard Tide fan. I grew up washing my clothes with Tide. Their big, orange jug is practically synonymous with my definition of "laundry." However, now there is a better alternative than all that plastic and waste. I honestly don't know why the major laundry detergent brands haven't caught on to the fact that most of us are climate conscious and are looking to be more environmentally responsible with our consumption.Despite that, I'm not willing to sacrifice quality. I want a product that is going to be effective, cost-efficient, AND better for the environment. I tried a number of different brands of laundry sheets before settling on Breezeo laundry strips. I like that the sheets are perforated, so you can easily choose how much you need per load. My husband is in construction, so his clothes are much dirtier than mine and typically need two strips. However, for everyday wear, one strip (or 1/3 of a sheet) is more than sufficient!The sheets themselves dissolve easily, whether you're washing in hot or cold water and this "Fresh Linen" scent is both clean and pleasant.Why lug a big, plastic tub of laundry detergent around when you can use these laundry strips? They're lighter, pack flatter, take up less space in your laundry room, are better for the environment, smell great, and clean your clothes just as well (if not better.)Loving laundry may still be a stretch, but I like doing it with these laundry strips a whole lot better than I used to!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy, Convenient and Works!
reviews.reviewText: These are great, clothes get clean, easy no mess or spill. Packaging is small, environment friendly and takes up less space in the laundry room. Great for traveling. The only issue I had was my fault, always add the sheet first, not on top of the clothes or you may get white marks which easily brush off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding laundry strips
reviews.reviewText: I love this product, I wish I had know. About it sooner. It works well and makes laundry smell good. Such a small cardboard container and fantastic for the environment. I buy this all of the time and recommend it to everyone I know. My niece travels a lot and it fits nicely in her suitcase. Tip marks for this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice product
reviews.reviewText: I really like using these sheets for my laundry. It's so nice not to have to lug the heavy jugs at every wash. These dissolve well has left no residue on clothes and leaves them clean and smelling fresh! The only thing I wish is that they would make bigger packages of them. We have lots of laundry and have to order often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wanted to love, but I was never certain my clothes were clean
reviews.reviewText: This review is written after having used the entire package. They were easy to use, dissolved well, and were convenient... but, I was always questioning if my clothes were clean. In fact, on some occasions, I had to re-launder my loads because the clothes still had typical body odors, and other indicators of not being clean. It got better when I started added 1 strip more than recommended. At that point, there were no odors, but the clothes smelled like absolutely nothing. So, I'd individually sniff each item before putting in the dryer. It caused me a lot of stress wondering if clothes were truly clean, so I ended up going back to Tide. Would love this method of strip detergent if it had a better formula that was more powerful at cleaning. My clothes are not especially dirty - just work from home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful laundry detergent
reviews.reviewText: I love this detergent. I have introduced it to my family and friends as well. I love that it replaces the heavy liquid containers and all the plastic waste. It has a pleasant smell to start but is very gently without dyes, as my family has sensitive skin and I avoid perfumes and dyes. It cleans the laundry well. It doesn't get every stain out so I do have to use other sprays of there is a major spill or oil stains, but I don't expect it to get rid of everything. I feel my clothes are clean and don't have any smell. The simplicity of the sheets make it easier for me to teach my kids to do the laundry and with a busy family of 7 with lots of sports uniforms. I have been so happy to find this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easier, more planet-friendly, decent clean
reviews.reviewText: I always feel guilty for buying detergent in those chunky plastic, one-time-use bottles - heavier to ship too, and to carry up and down floors. So I found Breezeo, read the reviews and took a chance. Happy I did... because I'll be buying this again :)PROS- Decent clean. Haven't tried it on anything too filthy, I admit, but on average fabrics with average smells and stains? Breezeo does the trick.- The cardboard envelope that the strips come in is small, light, and recyclable. No more bulky plastic bottles for me!- Great scent. You can't really smell it on your finished clothes, though, which I also like. But it's a fresh whiff of clean sweetness whenever you open the envelope flap.CONS- No suds. I mean, these detergent strips dissolve in the water and they do clean my loads, but the soap doesn't make visible suds, and I kinda just wish it would for peace of mind lol.
